message.entry: MATLABDriver must not be empty. Call "drivers" on your rfspecan object to detect valid drivers.
Resource must not be empty. Call "resources" on your rfspecan object to detect valid resources.
MATLABDriver "{0}" is not a valid driver for IviSpecAn. Call "drivers" on your rfspecan object to detect valid drivers.
Unable to find MATLAB driver for vendor driver IviSpecAn. Open the Support Package Installer to install the ividev support package.
Unable to connect to the MATLAB driver for vendor driver "{0}".
RF SpecAn Quick Control requires an Instrument Control Toolbox license.
Unable to complete operation. Reconnect to enable it.
Reading data in continuous sweep mode is unsupported. Set SweepModeContinuous property to false to obtain single sweeps.
Reading amplitude data requires configuring the instrument for zero-span measurements. Set Span to 0.
Unable to read spectral data when the span is 0. Set Span to a positive value.
